DOC.HEADLINE: NEWSWIRE : NHL , PLAYERS MIGHT RESUME TALKS
DOC.TEXT: Negotiations between representatives of the NHL and its players association , which stalled in the past week and further jeopardized the start of the 1994-95 season , might resume today or Wednesday at a site to be determined . A league source said he was " virtually certain " a meeting would be arranged today , but was not sure if it would take_place today or be put_off until Wednesday . No talks were held Monday . No full-scale negotiations have taken_place since Dec . 6 between Bob Goodenow , executive_director of the NHL Players Assn. , and Commissioner Gary Bettman . However , subcommittees from each side have met three times to discuss possible solutions to the lockout , which is in its 88th day . HELENE ELLIOTT
